tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  INSPIRATIONAL
comments: She truly cares about her students success. She\'s a genuine nice person. I learned so much from her.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Marty is a very sweet lady and great teacher. Her tests are hard but everything on it is from the lecture slides. Just study your notes and lecture slides hard and you will do well.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Marty can be nice but didn\'t find her very helpful and understanding. Her exams were extremely difficult and she doesn\'t like to be involved much in clinical and lecture besides minimum. She prefers students in her clinical group. You\'re on your own and you will have to study very hard to adjust to the first semester.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Overall wonderful level 1 instructor. She covers materials clearly in class and tests primarily from lecture! Listen to her lectures, record them, and listen to them again! Test questions come off the ppt slides, covered in lecture - you need to put your time in but you can do very well in Marty\'s class!!

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She made some subjects I felt were useless interesting for lecture, good presentations. Some test questions not covered in class so it\'s hard to study for tests. Overall supportive and wants you to succeed.
